title: TCNJ
subtitle: Research - Machine Learning & Computer Vision
description: Engaged in research at The College of New Jersey (TCNJ) focusing on Machine Learning and Computer Vision under the guidance of Dr. Andrea Salgian. Developed algorithms using Python, TensorFlow, and OpenCV for American Sign Language (ASL) classification and detection. Presented findings at ACM's SIGCSE Technical Symposium, showcasing our approach to over 1000 attendees.

title: BAE Systems
subtitle: Internship - SWE & Data Analytics
description: Contributed to software engineering and data analytics projects at BAE Systems in Mount Laurel, NJ. Developed a data analytics tool using Java and SQL for real-time image detection and classification. Contributed to the model-based systems engineering team by developing Java algorithms and creating plugins for CAMEO. Implemented a document scraping model in Python utilizing BFS graph algorithms.

title: TCNJ
subtitle: Position as Computer Science Peer Mentor/Tutor
description: Provided guidance and support to students in computer science courses as a Peer Mentor at TCNJ. Assisted in labs, explained complex algorithms, and promoted effective programming practices. Collaborated closely with faculty to ensure students received comprehensive guidance and support in their coursework.

title: Prudential Financial
subtitle: Internship - Software Engineering
description: Engaged in software engineering projects at Prudential Financial with a focus on microservices and APIs. Developed frontend components using React and TypeScript, ensuring responsive interfaces with Tailwind CSS. Implemented OAuth for authentication and utilized MSAL (Microsoft Authentication Library) for secure user authentication and authorization. Developed microservices using Node.js and Koa, and utilized FastAPI for building server-side applications. Implemented API security measures to safeguard data transmission and ensure compliance with security standards.
